analyzed: dper na nyungs kar bzhin / gzugs dang sgra dag @48b kyang rang gi dbang po las lhag par gzung bar bya ba dag go zhes pa thal ba dang bzlog pas khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba gnyis po 'di'o zhes pa'i sgra nye bar blang ba ni ma grub pa nyid yongs su spang
translated: For example, like mustard seed.üîΩAnd form and sound are apprehended as superior to their own faculties.üîΩThese two are the consequence and the reverse pervasion.

translated: then that is so, but the substance that is a composite of form and so on is small or large.

original: de'i sgo nas gzugs la sogs pa la lhag pa nyid la sogs pa nye bar btags pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas gzugs la sogs pa la lhag pa nyid la sogs pa nye bar btags pa'o zhe na /
translated: and on that basis, one imputes ‚Äúexcessive‚Äù to form and so on.

original: ji lta ba de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: ji lta ba de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is so, but we would say the following:

original: btags pa des kyang dri la sogs pa bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa yang lhag pa'o zhes 'dzin pa mi thob bo zhes pa 'di tsam brjod par bya'o //üîΩgzhan yang shes pa mtshungs pa yongs su gcad bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: btags pa des kyang dri la sogs pa bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa yang lhag pa'o zhes 'dzin pa mi thob bo zhes pa 'di tsam brjod par bya'o // gzhan yang shes pa mtshungs pa yongs su gcad bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Even by that imputation, one cannot apprehend form and so on as excessive, like smell and so on.

original: nye bar btags pa kho na mi rigs te /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa kho na mi rigs te /
translated: Moreover, it is illogical to impute it to form and so on because it is ascertained by the same consciousness.

original: rdzas la gang 'dra ba'i rdzas chung ngu'am chen po zhes pa'i shes pa de gzugs la sogs pa rnams la gzugs chung ngu'am chen po zhes khyad par med la /
analyzed: rdzas la gang 'dra ba'i rdzas chung ngu'am chen po zhes pa'i shes pa de gzugs la sogs pa rnams la gzugs chung ngu'am chen po zhes khyad par med la /
translated: The consciousness that apprehends a small or large substance in a substance is the same as the consciousness that apprehends a small or large form in form and so on.

original: dngos dang btags pa dag shes pa mtshungs pas yongs su gcad par bya ba'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos dang btags pa dag shes pa mtshungs pas yongs su gcad par bya ba'ang ma yin te /
translated: Also, real things and imputations are not ascertained by the same consciousness.

original: gang 'dra ba'i shes pas ba lang dngos yongs su gcod pa de 'dra ba kho nas nye bar btags pa khur bu ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: gang 'dra ba'i shes pas ba lang dngos yongs su gcod pa de 'dra ba kho nas nye bar btags pa khur bu ba ma yin pas so //
translated: Because the very same cognition that completely determines the cow also determines the hump, etc. as not being the cow.

original: gal te yang rten gyi sgo nas yon tan rnams dang yon tan dang ldan pa rnams rtogs par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te yang rten gyi sgo nas yon tan rnams dang yon tan dang ldan pa rnams rtogs par bya ba yin na /
translated: If the qualities and the possessors of the qualities are to be understood by way of their substratum,

original: sgra thams cad chen po'o zhes pa kho nar rtogs byar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra thams cad chen po'o zhes pa kho nar rtogs byar 'gyur te /
translated: then it would follow that all sounds are to be understood as great,

original: de'i rten nam mkha' tshad chen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rten nam mkha' tshad chen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because their substratum, space, is great.

original: de las kyang glang po che dang sbrang bu la sogs pa'i sgra rnams tshad tha dad par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang glang po che dang sbrang bu la sogs pa'i sgra rnams tshad tha dad par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And from that it would follow that the sounds of elephants, bees, etc. would not be understood as having different sizes.

original: de'i phyir de rnams kyang yon tan dang ldan par khas blang bar bya la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams kyang yon tan dang ldan par khas blang bar bya la /
translated: Therefore, they also should be accepted as possessing qualities.

original: yang na rdzas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: yang na rdzas kyang ma yin no //
translated: Or else, substance does not exist.

original: phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs dag ma grub par smras so //
analyzed: phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs dag ma grub par smras so //
translated: He says that the reasons are not established, because they engage externally, etc.

original: de ltar ni rten las phyi rol du 'jug pa ma yin pa nyid la brten nas /
analyzed: de ltar ni rten las phyi rol du 'jug pa ma yin pa nyid la brten nas /
translated: Thus, it is not the case that the eye goes out to its object.

original: bar dang bcas pa dang lhag pa 'dzin pa'i gtan tshigs dag mngon par brjod na /üîΩphyi rol du 'jug pa nyid la ni de 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bar dang bcas pa dang lhag pa 'dzin pa'i gtan tshigs dag mngon par brjod na / phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid la ni de 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Having stated the reasonings that the object is distant and that it is grasped as separate,üîΩit is not tenable that the eye goes out to its object.

original: gang gi phyir dbang po ni phyi rol du son nas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dbang po ni phyi rol du son nas /
translated: Because the eye sense faculty does not go out to the object.

original: rnam par rgyu pa'i yul dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: rnam par rgyu pa'i yul dang ldan zhing /
translated: It possesses an object that is distant and

original: de rten @49b las lhag par snang ste /
analyzed: de rten @49b las lhag par snang ste /
translated: it appears to be separate from its support,

original: mar me'i snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: mar me'i snang ba bzhin no //
translated: like the light of a lamp.

original: de'i phyir de'i yul bar dang bcas ba dang / ltag par 'dzin pa 'thad kyi /üîΩrten las te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i yul bar dang bcas ba dang / ltag par 'dzin pa 'thad kyi / rten las te /
translated: Therefore it is tenable that its object is distant and that it is grasped as separate,

original: dbang po las ma yin no zhes pa bsam pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po las ma yin no zhes pa bsam pa'o //
translated: but not that it goes out to its object.üîΩThe meaning is that it does not go out to its object, the eye sense faculty.

original: 'dir brtsad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir brtsad par bya ste /
translated: Here one might argue as follows:

original: mig ni 'od dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir 'od zer rnams byung nas don gsal bar byed ces khas blangs pa'i phyir phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid du dogs par rigs na /
analyzed: mig ni 'od dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir 'od zer rnams byung nas don gsal bar byed ces khas blangs pa'i phyir phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid du dogs par rigs na /
translated: Since it is accepted that the eye possesses light and light rays arise and illuminate the object, it is reasonable to suspect that it goes out to its object.

original: rna ba ni nyan byed kyi bu gar yongs su bcad pa'i nam mkha'i phyogs kyi khyad par yin te /
analyzed: rna ba ni nyan byed kyi bu gar yongs su bcad pa'i nam mkha'i phyogs kyi khyad par yin te /
translated: The ear is a particular of the space-side which is limited by the cavity of the ear.

original: de ni pha rol pos phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid du 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni pha rol pos phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid du 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not accepted that it is an external object.

original: des ni ci ltar de de ltar dogs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des ni ci ltar de de ltar dogs zhes pa'o //
translated: How can it be doubted that it is just so?

original: 'di ltar sems te nam mkha' phyogs dang ldan pa nyid du btags shing /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te nam mkha' phyogs dang ldan pa nyid du btags shing /
translated: Thus, it is imagined that space is endowed with a side.

original: don dam par ni de cha shas med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: don dam par ni de cha shas med pa kho na ste /
translated: But in the ultimate sense, it is certainly partless.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis btags pa'i phyogs la gang phyi rol du 'jug pa ma yin pa de nyid la skyon brjod pa la /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis btags pa'i phyogs la gang phyi rol du 'jug pa ma yin pa de nyid la skyon brjod pa la /
translated: The fault is stated in regard to just that which is not an external object in the side imagined in the manner explained.

original: ma rtogs pas don dam pa'i phyogs la brten pas phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid du res 'ga' pha rol pos rtogs par byed do zhes pa de'i phyir dogs par rigs so //
analyzed: ma rtogs pas don dam pa'i phyogs la brten pas phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid du res 'ga' pha rol pos rtogs par byed do zhes pa de'i phyir dogs par rigs so //
translated: Since it is not understood, the opponent sometimes imagines that it is an external object, because it is based on the ultimate side. Therefore, it is reasonable to doubt.

original: de la gso ba la sogs pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir zhes pa 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: de la gso ba la sogs pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir zhes pa 'thad pa'o //
translated: In that regard, the statement ‚Äúbecause of application to healing, etc.‚Äù is the proof.

original: 'on rkang pa bsku ba la sogs pas rten las gzhan du yang mig la sogs pa bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on rkang pa bsku ba la sogs pas rten las gzhan du yang mig la sogs pa bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the eye, etc. active in other places, such as when the feet are massaged?

original: de'i phyir gang la gso ba'i sbyor ba can de la dbang po'o zhes pa 'di mtha' gcig tu nges pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang la gso ba'i sbyor ba can de la dbang po'o zhes pa 'di mtha' gcig tu nges pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not certain that the sense faculty is where the application of healing is effective.

original: de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: der yang ma ma gso ba'i sgo nas gzhon nu'i bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i rten la gnas pa kho na'i rtsa 'pho bas gso ba rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: der yang ma ma gso ba'i sgo nas gzhon nu'i bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i rten la gnas pa kho na'i rtsa 'pho bas gso ba rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir te /
translated: because even there, the application of healing is effective only through the channels that exist in the support of the eye, etc., just as a child‚Äôs face is nourished by the mother‚Äôs nourishment.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na de la nye ba ma yin zhing de dag 'brel pa nyams su ma myong ba ni ci ltar gso bar bya /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na de la nye ba ma yin zhing de dag 'brel pa nyams su ma myong ba ni ci ltar gso bar bya /
translated: If it were otherwise, how could healing be effective when the sense faculty is not present and the connection with it is not experienced?

original: ci ste gso ba'i dus su rkang pa la sogs pa la nye bar gyur pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gso ba'i dus su rkang pa la sogs pa la nye bar gyur pa'o zhe na /
translated: But if the feet, etc. are present at the time of healing,

original: de ltar gyur na rkar pa la sogs pas gzugs 'dzin par thal lo //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na rkar pa la sogs pas gzugs 'dzin par thal lo //
translated: then it would follow that the feet, etc. would apprehend form.

original: de'i phyir rang gi rten la gnas pa kho na ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas gso bar bya'o zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi rten la gnas pa kho na ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas gso bar bya'o zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should accept that the eye sense faculty, which is located in its own support, sees visible form in the manner that has been explained.

original: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: dbang po gang zhig rang gi rten la gso bar bya ba de de kho nal 'jug ste /
analyzed: dbang po gang zhig rang gi rten la gso bar bya ba de de kho nal 'jug ste /
translated: The sense faculty that sees the object located in its own support is the eye sense faculty alone,

original: sna la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: sna la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: like the nose sense faculty, etc.

original: mig dang rna ba dag kyang rang gi rten la gso bar bya ba dag go zhes pa rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dag kyang rang gi rten la gso bar bya ba dag go zhes pa rang bzhin no //
translated: The eye sense faculty and the ear sense faculty also see and hear the object located in their own support. This is their nature.

original: de'i phyir dbang po kho na las zhes pa ste /üîΩtshig phrad @50a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po kho na las zhes pa ste / tshig phrad @50a * //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúfrom the sense faculty alone.‚Äù

original: ni rim pa tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: ni rim pa tha dad pa ste /
translated: The particle eva is different in order.

original: rnam par chod pa kho na la zhes pa 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par chod pa kho na la zhes pa 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that it is only in the phrase ‚Äúfrom the sense faculty alone.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: gang gi phyir rten las kyang rnam par bcad pa'i don zhes 'dzin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rten las kyang rnam par bcad pa'i don zhes 'dzin te /
translated: Because the object is apprehended as being separate from the support.

original: dbang po 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not apprehended from the sense faculty alone.

original: gang phyir rten gyi sgo kho nas ni dbang po las don bar dang bcas pa 'dzin par rtogs te /
analyzed: gang phyir rten gyi sgo kho nas ni dbang po las don bar dang bcas pa 'dzin par rtogs te /
translated: The object is understood to be apprehended from the sense faculty alone through the door of the support.

original: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //üîΩskyon gzhan brjod par bzhed pas phyi rol du 'pho ba khas blangs nas gsungs pa /üîΩyod du chug na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no // skyon gzhan brjod par bzhed pas phyi rol du 'pho ba khas blangs nas gsungs pa / yod du chug na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: As it was explained above.üîΩüîΩDesiring to state another fault, he says, ‚ÄúEven if it is accepted that there is transference to the external,‚Äù and so on.üîΩüîΩEven if it is accepted that there is transference to the external, it is not tenable that there is a self.üîΩ

original: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pas phyi rol du 'phos pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i nus pa med pa la gtan tshigs gsungs te /üîΩdbang po gang gi rten bkab pa na yul 'dzin pa med pa de phyi rol du 'phos pas ni gegs med par yul 'dzin pa'i nus pa med de /üîΩpags pa la sogs pa'i dbang po bzhin /üîΩmig dang rna ba dag kyang rang gi rten bkab pa na yul 'dzin pa med do //üîΩ'bras bu mi dmigs ba'o //üîΩ'o na mig gi nus mthu'i mtshan nyid 'jug pa ni rten bkab pa na 'jig pa'am /üîΩrten bkab pa'i dus na de kho na la myur du rab tu 'jug pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pas phyi rol du 'phos pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i nus pa med pa la gtan tshigs gsungs te /üîΩdbang po gang gi rten bkab pa na yul 'dzin pa med pa de phyi rol du 'phos pas ni gegs med par yul 'dzin pa'i nus pa med de /üîΩpags pa la sogs pa'i dbang po bzhin /üîΩmig dang rna ba dag kyang rang gi rten bkab pa na yul 'dzin pa med do //üîΩ'bras bu mi dmigs ba'o //üîΩ'o na mig gi nus mthu'i mtshan nyid 'jug pa ni rten bkab pa na 'jig pa'am /üîΩrten bkab pa'i dus na de kho na la myur du rab tu 'jug pa ma yin nam /
translated: As was previously explained.

original: de'i phyir skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyon 'di med de /
translated: Therefore, this fault does not exist.

original: rten ma bkab pa kho na ni de'i yul 'dzin pa'i nus pa yin gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rten ma bkab pa kho na ni de'i yul 'dzin pa'i nus pa yin gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: The capacity to apprehend the object of that is only the uncovered support, not another aspect.

original: rna ba'i dbang po'i ngor re zhig 'di yang dag par 'jog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang po'i ngor re zhig 'di yang dag par 'jog pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not posited as the nature of the ear sense faculty because

original: de rten bkab pa na yang phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rtag pa nyid kyi phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: de rten bkab pa na yang phyi rol du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rtag pa nyid kyi phyir yang ngo //
translated: when its support is covered, it still engages external objects and because it is permanent.

original: mig gi ngor gal te 'di lan yin zhes so sor re bar 'gyur na de yang dor cig / gang gi phyir /
analyzed: mig gi ngor gal te 'di lan yin zhes so sor re bar 'gyur na de yang dor cig / gang gi phyir /
translated: If you think that this is the reply from the perspective of the eye sense faculty, then that is also rejected because

original: mig gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i 'od kyi cha shas can ni 'phos nas /
analyzed: mig gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i 'od kyi cha shas can ni 'phos nas /
translated: the part of light that becomes the nature of the eye sense faculty

original: bdag nyid thams cad kyis yul dang yang dag par ldan pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad kyis yul dang yang dag par ldan pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: transmits to the object with its entire nature.

original: de kho na la nye ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de kho na la nye ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore it is close to that object,

original: rten la ma yin la /
analyzed: rten la ma yin la /
translated: not to the support.

original: de dang log pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de dang log pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: And because it is not separate from that,

original: mig kyang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: mig kyang ngo zhe na /
translated: the eye sense faculty is also not the support.

original: gang las rnam par dbye bas rten la yang 'jug par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang las rnam par dbye bas rten la yang 'jug par 'gyur ba /
translated: From what is it separated so that it engages the support?

original: de'i cha shas rnams yod pa ma yin pas te /
analyzed: de'i cha shas rnams yod pa ma yin pas te /
translated: Since the parts of the eye do not exist,

original: de las kyang de'i tshe de'i rten du mngon par 'dod pa'i lus kyi cha shas ni de'i rten du 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de las kyang de'i tshe de'i rten du mngon par 'dod pa'i lus kyi cha shas ni de'i rten du 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: at that time, the body part that is asserted to be the basis of the eye is not the basis of the eye.

original: 'brel ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'brel ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are not related.

original: dbang po gzhan bzhin nam ha cang thal ba yang na'o //
analyzed: dbang po gzhan bzhin nam ha cang thal ba yang na'o //
translated: It follows that the eye is like the other sense faculties or it is absurd.

original: rten ma yin na yang bkab pa na de'i 'jig pa dang 'jug pa dag @50b cis 'gyur zhes pa'am ha cang thal ba'o //
analyzed: rten ma yin na yang bkab pa na de'i 'jig pa dang 'jug pa dag @50b cis 'gyur zhes pa'am ha cang thal ba'o //
translated: If it is not the basis, then what is the point of covering it? It follows that the eye would not engage or disengage.

original: ci ste cha dang bcas par 'od kyi cha shas can rtog na /
analyzed: ci ste cha dang bcas par 'od kyi cha shas can rtog na /
translated: If you imagine that light has parts,

original: de lta na yang de'i phyogs yul dang yang dag par ldan pa shes pa nye bar skye ba'i rgyu yin pa de la skyon de kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang de'i phyogs yul dang yang dag par ldan pa shes pa nye bar skye ba'i rgyu yin pa de la skyon de kho na'o //
translated: then the same error applies to the position that the eye is the cause of the arising of the consciousness that is in complete contact with its object.

original: 'on te de mig gi dbang po la don gzhan nyid du 'dod na de'i tshe de kho na mig gi ngo bo bstan ba'i shugs las dang / de'i mtshan nyid las mig gi yin zhing /

translated: If you assert that the eye is a different object from the eye faculty, then the eye is the eye faculty by the power of teaching the nature of the eye and by the power of its definition.

original: de la yang cha shas dang bcas pa dang / cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyogs dag la skyon dang bcas pa de'i gnas skabs kho na'o zhes pas 'di ni gyi na yin no //
analyzed: de la yang cha shas dang bcas pa dang / cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyogs dag la skyon dang bcas pa de'i gnas skabs kho na'o zhes pas 'di ni gyi na yin no //
translated: In this regard, the fault of having parts and being partless is only in the position that it is permanent.

original: lnga po rnams dbang po nyid na zhes pa /
analyzed: lnga po rnams dbang po nyid na zhes pa /
translated: The five are faculties.

original: sna dang lce dang mig dang pags pa dang rna ba rnams dbang po rnams so zhes pa'i mdo las so //
analyzed: sna dang lce dang mig dang pags pa dang rna ba rnams dbang po rnams so zhes pa'i mdo las so //
translated: The s≈´tra says, ‚ÄúThe nose, tongue, eyes, skin, and ears are faculties.‚Äù

original: bde sogs gzhal bya min pa'am //
analyzed: bde sogs gzhal bya min pa'am //
translated: Pleasure, etc., are not objects of knowledge.

original: zhes pas mtshan nyid ma tshang pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas mtshan nyid ma tshang pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: This states the fault of incomplete definition.

original: bde ba la sogs pa shes pa mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyis ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa shes pa mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyis ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because pleasure, etc., are not included in the definition of direct perception.

original: de las kyang bde ba la sogs pa rnams gzhal bya nyid du khas len pa 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: de las kyang bde ba la sogs pa rnams gzhal bya nyid du khas len pa 'gal ba'o //
translated: Moreover, it is contradictory to accept that pleasure, etc., are objects of knowledge.

original: de la 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de la 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: In this regard, this is possible.

original: gal te yang bde ba la sogs pa mngon sum gyi yul du mi 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal te yang bde ba la sogs pa mngon sum gyi yul du mi 'gyur mod /
translated: Even if pleasure, etc., are not objects of direct perception,

analyzed: de lta na yang rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i yul nyid kyi phyir gzhal byar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In that case, it is an object of comprehension because it is the object of inference, etc.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /

analyzed: bdag @53b dang dbang po dang yid dang don phrad pa las gang grub pa de gzhan no //
translated: That which is established from the contact of self, sense faculty, mind, and object is different.

original: mngon sum tshad ma'o zhes pa ngag lhag ma'o //
analyzed: mngon sum tshad ma'o zhes pa ngag lhag ma'o //
translated: Perception is valid knowledge is the remainder of the statement.

analyzed: 'brel pa 'di la mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi mdo 'di rnam par bshad par bya'o //

analyzed: dbang po dang phrad pa la mngon sum mam bdag dang yid phrad pa'o zhes pa 'di'i phyir mdo las byung ba'o zhes smras so //

analyzed: rdzas smos pas yon tan dang las dag la'ang mdo las byung ba'i mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid gzhan yod do zhes ston to //

analyzed: de slar yang yon tan dang las rnams phrad pa rnams la shes pa 'grub pa'i phyir rdzas rgyu ste /

original: rgyu'i rgyu yang ngo zhes pa 'di ni rang gi rten gyis mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa'i yon tan dang las rnams la shes pa nye bar skye ba ma yin no //

translated: The cognition of the qualities and actions that are not in contact with their own substratum does not arise.

original: de'i phyir de'i rten rdzas ni yon tan dang las rnams gsal bar byed cing de'i shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i rten rdzas ni yon tan dang las rnams gsal bar byed cing de'i shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the substance that is their substratum manifests the qualities and actions and becomes the cause of their cognition.

analyzed: yon tan dang las kyi shes pa'i rgyu ni dbang po dang don phrad pa'o //

analyzed: de'i rgyu rdzas bum pa la sogs pa ni rgyu'i rgyu'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: The material cause of that, such as a pot, is the causal cause.

original: 'dir yang gtso bo nyid kyi phyir dang / don gcig la 'dus pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir bdag dang yid phrad pa las skye la /
analyzed: 'dir yang gtso bo nyid kyi phyir dang / don gcig la 'dus pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir bdag dang yid phrad pa las skye la /
translated: Here, because of being the principal one, and because of the cause being included in the same object, the self arises from the contact of the self and the mind.

analyzed: dbang po dang yid dang don phrad pa rnams ni de la phan 'dogs pa po rnams so //

original: kha cig ni zhes pa ste /

analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa tshad ma nyid yin na 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask, is it not the case that the self is the cause of the arising of the mind?

original: phrad ba cig shos rnams ni dran pa la sogs pa'i shes pa'i thun mong ba rnams te dbang po dang don phrad pa ni mngon sum kho na'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: phrad ba cig shos rnams ni dran pa la sogs pa'i shes pa'i thun mong ba rnams te dbang po dang don phrad pa ni mngon sum kho na'i rgyu'o //
translated: The other kinds of contact are the general ones of memory and so on. The contact of the sense faculty and object is the cause of direct perception alone.

original: gtso bo nyid kyi phyir zhes pa bdag dang yid dag gtso bo nyid kyi phyir de phrad pa yang gtso bo nyid de /
analyzed: gtso bo nyid kyi phyir zhes pa bdag dang yid dag gtso bo nyid kyi phyir de phrad pa yang gtso bo nyid de /
translated: Because of their preeminence, the contact of the self and mind is also preeminence.

original: des na dbyangs can pa la sogs pa rnams te 'dod par byed do //
analyzed: des na dbyangs can pa la sogs pa rnams te 'dod par byed do //
translated: Thus the Grammarians and so on assert this.

original: de la bdag ni gtso bo nyid de /
analyzed: de la bdag ni gtso bo nyid de /
translated: The self is preeminent

original: shes pa'i byed pa po nyid kyi phyir dang / de'i rtags nyid kyi phyir dang / 'bras bu nye bar longs spyod pa po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i byed pa po nyid kyi phyir dang / de'i rtags nyid kyi phyir dang / 'bras bu nye bar longs spyod pa po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the agent of consciousness, because it is the sign of that, and because it is the experiencer of the result.

original: yid kyang ste yul thams cad pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa dang don gcig la 'du ba nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩde lta na yang zhes pa la @54a * //
analyzed: yid kyang ste yul thams cad pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa dang don gcig la 'du ba nyid kyi phyir ro // de lta na yang zhes pa la @54a * //
translated: The mind is also preeminent because it is the object of all and because it is the meeting point of consciousness and object.

original: sogs pas bstan bcos dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: sogs pas bstan bcos dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: Even so, the Commentary states that this contradicts the treatise.

original: ji ltar bdag nyid me la sogs pa rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i rtags mngon sum pa mthong nas mngon sum ma yin pa'i don la rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba de ltar khyad par dran pa dang ldan pa 'di kho na'i spyi tsam mthong ba las
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid me la sogs pa rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i rtags mngon sum pa mthong nas mngon sum ma yin pa'i don la rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba de ltar khyad par dran pa dang ldan pa 'di kho na'i spyi tsam mthong ba las
translated: Just as one sees the evidence of a memory of fire, and so on, and then infers a nonperceived object, in just the same way, one who has a memory of the particulars sees only the mere universal, and so

original: gzung bzhin pa ma yin pa'i khyad par rnams la the tshom mo zhes pa the tshom 'grub pa ni rtags can dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: gzung bzhin pa ma yin pa'i khyad par rnams la the tshom mo zhes pa the tshom 'grub pa ni rtags can dang mtshungs so //
translated: doubts the particulars that are not being apprehended. The establishment of doubt is similar to the case of the evidence.

original: ji ltar yang yang dag pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'di ni don gyi rang bzhin no zhes mngon sum skye ba de ltar yang dag pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'di kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes gtan la phebs pa skye'o
analyzed: ji ltar yang yang dag pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'di ni don gyi rang bzhin no zhes mngon sum skye ba de ltar yang dag pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'di kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes gtan la phebs pa skye'o
translated: Just as the perception arises, ‚ÄúThis is the nature of the object,‚Äù through the power of the connection with the real object, in just the same way, the ascertainment arises, ‚ÄúThis alone is real, but not the other,‚Äù through the power of the connection with the real object.üîΩThus, the establishment of this is similar to the case of perception.

original: zhes pas 'di'i 'grub pa mngon sum dang mtshungs so zhes gang bshad pa de 'gal lo //
analyzed: zhes pas 'di'i 'grub pa mngon sum dang mtshungs so zhes gang bshad pa de 'gal lo //
translated: This is what you have said, but it is contradictory.

original: gtan la phebs pa ni rnam par brtags pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: gtan la phebs pa ni rnam par brtags pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes 'brel lo //
translated: because the ascertainment is preceded by the examination.

original: spyir mthong ba can gyi the tshom du gyur pa ni /
analyzed: spyir mthong ba can gyi the tshom du gyur pa ni /
translated: In general, doubt is seen to be

original: rnam par brtags pa las gang gi tshe khyad par gyi ngo bos don nges par 'dzin pa de'i tshe 'di ni ba lang kho na yin gyi ba men ni ma yin no zhes gtan la phebs pa skye'o //
analyzed: rnam par brtags pa las gang gi tshe khyad par gyi ngo bos don nges par 'dzin pa de'i tshe 'di ni ba lang kho na yin gyi ba men ni ma yin no zhes gtan la phebs pa skye'o //
translated: when, through examination, one ascertains the object by means of a distinguishing nature, then ascertainment arises, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is just an ox, not a gayal.‚Äù

original: yul la lta don can nyid phyir //
analyzed: yul la lta don can nyid phyir //
translated: Because it has the purpose of seeing the object.

original: zhes pa yul nyams su myong ba'i dgos pa can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa yul nyams su myong ba'i dgos pa can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: because it has the purpose of experiencing the object.

original: yul la lta ba tsam gyi don ni zhes pa la /
analyzed: yul la lta ba tsam gyi don ni zhes pa la /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúmere seeing of the object‚Äù is

original: tsam gyi sgra ni lhag pa rnam par gcad pa'i don to //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra ni lhag pa rnam par gcad pa'i don to //
translated: the word ‚Äúmere‚Äù has the meaning of excluding what is in excess.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: khyad par sgro 'dogs pa la sogs pa la ni bya ba ma yin zhes pas /
analyzed: khyad par sgro 'dogs pa la sogs pa la ni bya ba ma yin zhes pas /
translated: since it is said that ‚Äúthere is no activity in superimposition of distinctions and so on,‚Äù

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: that is also because it is nonconceptual.

original: gang gi'ang yul nyams su myong ba tsam dgos pa yin pa de rnam par brtag pa la ltos pa med par 'jug ste /
analyzed: gang gi'ang yul nyams su myong ba tsam dgos pa yin pa de rnam par brtag pa la ltos pa med par 'jug ste /
translated: It is necessary to experience the mere object of any of those, and it engages without depending on an examination of that.

original: de ston par byed pa /
analyzed: de ston par byed pa /
translated: That is taught by the following:

original: de la rnam par gcod pa ga las zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de la rnam par gcod pa ga las zhes pa ste /
translated: How can there be an exclusion from that?

original: de las kyang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi phyir de dang gtan la phebs pa skye ba mtshungs pa ni ma yin te dper na rjes su dpag pa dang bzhin no //
analyzed: de las kyang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi phyir de dang gtan la phebs pa skye ba mtshungs pa ni ma yin te dper na rjes su dpag pa dang bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, because of the very dissimilarity of the object, the arising of ascertainment is not the same as that, just as with inference.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod yod pa'i don dang 'brel pa'i dbang la skye ba tsam bsgre bar byed pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod yod pa'i don dang 'brel pa'i dbang la skye ba tsam bsgre bar byed pa'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is so, but that the mere arising of the object related to the existent is being extended,

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: that is not correct.

original: khyad par bsgre bar byed pa don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par bsgre bar byed pa don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that the extension of the distinction is meaningless.

original: the tshom dang rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa rnams dang yang de ltar skye ba mtshungs pa 'thob ste /
analyzed: the tshom dang rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa rnams dang yang de ltar skye ba mtshungs pa 'thob ste /
translated: Also, doubt and inference and so on obtain the same arising.

original: de rnams kyang spyi la sogs pa @54b yang dag pa'i don dang mngon par 'brel ba'i dbang gis skye ba'i phyir na bsgre ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pas shes pa nyid chos mthun pa de yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang spyi la sogs pa @54b yang dag pa'i don dang mngon par 'brel ba'i dbang gis skye ba'i phyir na bsgre ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pas shes pa nyid chos mthun pa de yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since those are also produced by the power of the connection with the correct meaning, such as generality, they are not at all redundant.

original: rnam pa thams cad 'dzin par thal mo zhes pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad 'dzin par thal mo zhes pa /
translated: The statement ‚Äúit would follow that consciousness would apprehend all aspects‚Äù is a similar reason.

original: rnam pa kun gyis te /
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyis te /
translated: ‚ÄúIn every way‚Äù means

original: mang po can nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang po can nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: that it would also apprehend multiplicity, etc.

original: cha shas gang la nus pa de kho na 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: cha shas gang la nus pa de kho na 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is said that it would apprehend only that part which has the capacity, it is said:

original: thams cad kyi bdag nyid dang / ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag nyid dang / ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of all‚Äù and so on.

original: cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it is partless,

original: don ci rigs par phrad pa rnam pa lngas gang dbang po dang phrad pa ma yin pa'i cha shas de yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: don ci rigs par phrad pa rnam pa lngas gang dbang po dang phrad pa ma yin pa'i cha shas de yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: it is not the case that there is any part that does not contact the object in any of the five ways.

original: de las kyang de'i khyad par rnams don las tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir don lta bur de rnams la yang 'dzin pa skyed par nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang de'i khyad par rnams don las tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir don lta bur de rnams la yang 'dzin pa skyed par nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, since the features are not different from the object, they are able to generate the apprehension of the object.

original: 'o na gang kho na 'dzin par 'dod pa'i cha shas de kho na gzung bar bya ba ma yin nam zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na gang kho na 'dzin par 'dod pa'i cha shas de kho na gzung bar bya ba ma yin nam zhen gsungs pa /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that only the part that is asserted to be apprehended is apprehended?

original: 'di ci zhig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ci zhig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The response to this is ‚ÄúWhat is this . . . ?‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe pha rol rnams mthong ba pos bltas nas don mthong ba las sngar kho nar 'di ci zhe na khyad par med par 'dzin par 'dod par gyur pa na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe pha rol rnams mthong ba pos bltas nas don mthong ba las sngar kho nar 'di ci zhe na khyad par med par 'dzin par 'dod par gyur pa na /
translated: When the opponent sees the seer looking, prior to seeing the object, he asserts that he apprehends it without distinguishing it.

original: de la rtogs nas mthong bar phyed pa de'i tshe skyon 'di 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de la rtogs nas mthong bar phyed pa de'i tshe skyon 'di 'byung ngo //
translated: When he realizes that and sees it, this error arises.

original: phrad pa smra ba la yang skyon 'di brjod par byas pas 'di ni don gyis shes pa smra ba la yang brjod pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phrad pa smra ba la yang skyon 'di brjod par byas pas 'di ni don gyis shes pa smra ba la yang brjod pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since this error is stated in the context of the theory of contact, it is also stated implicitly in the context of the theory of perception.

original: de ltar ni phrad pa don 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o zhes pa la skyon 'di brjod par bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni phrad pa don 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o zhes pa la skyon 'di brjod par bya ba yin zhing /
translated: In that case, the fault would be stated in the passage, ‚ÄúIf contact is the cause of apprehending objects . . .‚Äù

original: shes pa tshad mar smra bas kyang de kho na shes pa'i rgyur 'dod par bya'o zhes pas skyon mtshungs so //
analyzed: shes pa tshad mar smra bas kyang de kho na shes pa'i rgyur 'dod par bya'o zhes pas skyon mtshungs so //
translated: And the fault would be the same for you, because you also assert that the cause of knowing reality is contact.

original: de ltar ni skyon 'di kho na rjes su dpag par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni skyon 'di kho na rjes su dpag par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, this fault would be the same as the one explained in the inference.

original: gal te dbang po dang don 'brel par gyur pa na bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te dbang po dang don 'brel par gyur pa na bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: If it follows that when the sense faculty and object come into contact, the object is apprehended in its entirety,

original: khyed kyi yang dbang po gsum po rnams kyis 'brel bzhin pa'i yul la ci'i phyir bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dzin par gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: khyed kyi yang dbang po gsum po rnams kyis 'brel bzhin pa'i yul la ci'i phyir bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dzin par gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: then why don‚Äôt all three sense faculties apprehend the object that is in contact with them in its entirety?

original: kho bo cag gis phrad pa de'i rgyur 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag gis phrad pa de'i rgyur 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: We do not assert that contact is the cause of apprehending objects.

original: de rdzas su yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rdzas su yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist as a substance.

original: gzhan yang kho bo cag ni mig la sogs pas kyang don rnam pa thams cad gzung bar bya ba'o zhes 'dod do //üîΩde gzung ba na yang de ltar 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir cha shas 'ga' zhig la nges par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pas tha dad du rung ba @55a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang kho bo cag ni mig la sogs pas kyang don rnam pa thams cad gzung bar bya ba'o zhes 'dod do // de gzung ba na yang de ltar 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir cha shas 'ga' zhig la nges par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pas tha dad du rung ba @55a * //
translated: Moreover, we accept that the eye and so on also apprehend objects in all aspects.üîΩEven when they are apprehended, because the reason for error exists in that way, it is not ascertained in some part.

original: ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is not suitable to be different,

original: de ni ma bzung ba dang 'dra ba 'ba' zhig go zhes pa 'di ni brjod zin to //
analyzed: de ni ma bzung ba dang 'dra ba 'ba' zhig go zhes pa 'di ni brjod zin to //
translated: it is just like not apprehending it. This has already been explained.

original: gal te yang pha rol po yang 'di skad du smra bar byed na /
analyzed: gal te yang pha rol po yang 'di skad du smra bar byed na /
translated: If the opponent also speaks in this way,

original: des 'di skad du smra bar 'os pa ma yin te /üîΩgang don rnams dngos su lta ba 'di ni ba lang kho na'o //
analyzed: des 'di skad du smra bar 'os pa ma yin te / gang don rnams dngos su lta ba 'di ni ba lang kho na'o //
translated: it is not suitable for them to speak in this way.

original: 'di ni rta kho na zhes pa lta bu de mngon sum mo zhes smras pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni rta kho na zhes pa lta bu de mngon sum mo zhes smras pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they say, ‚ÄúThis is direct perception, which directly sees objects, such as ‚ÄòThis is a cow,‚Äô and ‚ÄòThis is a horse.‚Äô‚Äù

original: de ltar yang dag pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'di 'di'i rang bzhin no zhes 'byung ba mngon sum mo zhes smras pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis 'di 'di'i rang bzhin no zhes 'byung ba mngon sum mo zhes smras pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, because of the connection with the meaning of reality, it is said that ‚Äúthis is the nature of that,‚Äù and it is direct perception.

original: de bzhin du gang 'di ni dbang po rnams kyi don rnams la rab tu grub pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang 'di ni dbang po rnams kyi don rnams la rab tu grub pa ste /
translated: In the same way, it is established that this is the object of the sense faculties.

original: 'di ni sgra'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sgra'o //
translated: This is sound.

original: 'di ni gzugs so //üîΩ'di ni ro'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs so // 'di ni ro'o //
translated: This is form.üîΩThis is taste.üîΩThis is smell.

original: 'di ni dri'o //üîΩ'di ni reg pa'o zhes pa'o zhes kyang brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dri'o // 'di ni reg pa'o zhes pa'o zhes kyang brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is tactility.

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum nges pa'i bdag nyid du pha rol pos 'dod pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum nges pa'i bdag nyid du pha rol pos 'dod pas so //
translated: Because the opponent asserts that direct perception has the nature of ascertainment.

original: 'di kho na yang nges pa rnams kyi rang gi don rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di kho na yang nges pa rnams kyi rang gi don rtogs pa ste /
translated: This is the ascertainment of the object by those who ascertain it.

original: gang de nges par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang de nges par 'byed pa'o //
translated: That is the decisive factor.

original: de gal te rnam pa gzhan bzhin du ma nges pa yin na /
analyzed: de gal te rnam pa gzhan bzhin du ma nges pa yin na /
translated: If that is not ascertained like other aspects,

original: de rnams kyis bzung zin pa ci ltar yin /
analyzed: de rnams kyis bzung zin pa ci ltar yin /
translated: how can it be apprehended by them?

original: da ni khyed la'ang mngon sum gyis ma nges shing de la yang gzung ba zhes bya ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: da ni khyed la'ang mngon sum gyis ma nges shing de la yang gzung ba zhes bya ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: Now, how can it be that for you, direct perception is not ascertained, and that it is called ‚Äúapprehension‚Äù?

original: mngon sum ni gang gi'ang nges par byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum ni gang gi'ang nges par byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin te /
translated: Perception is not the nature of the ascertainment of anything.

original: des gang zhig 'dzin pa de yang nges pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des gang zhig 'dzin pa de yang nges pas ni ma yin no //
translated: And that which it apprehends is not ascertained by it.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: der snang bas so //
analyzed: der snang bas so //
translated: It appears as that.

original: de bas na nges pa dang ma nges pa'i dbang las mngon sum gyi 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa dag ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na nges pa dang ma nges pa'i dbang las mngon sum gyi 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa dag ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, perception is not the apprehension or non-apprehension of anything due to the power of ascertainment or non-ascertainment.

original: nges pa'i 'di ni lta bu ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa'i 'di ni lta bu ma yin te /
translated: This ascertainment is not like that.

original: cung zad nges kyang gzhan ma nges pa 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: cung zad nges kyang gzhan ma nges pa 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Even if it ascertains something slightly, it is the apprehension or non-apprehension of something else that is not ascertained.

original: de'i phyir nges pa gang yin pa de kho na 'di'i 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa gang yin pa de kho na 'di'i 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, whatever is ascertained is just the apprehension of that.

original: gzhan du na rnam pa gcig la yang der mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rnam pa gcig la yang der mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, even in one aspect it would not be so.

original: yang bdag nyid thams cad kyis bzung na yang de ltar nges par mi 'gyur ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: yang bdag nyid thams cad kyis bzung na yang de ltar nges par mi 'gyur ba ci zhe na /
translated: But if it apprehends by its entire nature, why is it not ascertained in that way?

original: lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the cooperating conditions are incomplete.

original: nyams su myong ba ni rnam par rtog pa goms pa ji lta bar nges pa rnams skyed par byed de /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni rnam par rtog pa goms pa ji lta bar nges pa rnams skyed par byed de /
translated: Experience is the cause of the ascertainment of the object of the conception in accordance with the conception.

original: dper na gzugs mthong ba la khyad par med kyang /
analyzed: dper na gzugs mthong ba la khyad par med kyang /
translated: For example, although there is no difference in seeing a form,

original: ro dang 'dod ldan ma dang bza' bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams lta bu'o //
analyzed: ro dang 'dod ldan ma dang bza' bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams lta bu'o //
translated: there is a difference in the conception of the taste, the woman, and the food.

original: de la blo gsal ba nyid dang de'i bag chags goms pa dang skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams nyams su myong ba la nges pa skye ba'i rgyu rnams so //
analyzed: de la blo gsal ba nyid dang de'i bag chags goms pa dang skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams nyams su myong ba la nges pa skye ba'i rgyu rnams so //
translated: Among them, the cause of the ascertainment of the experience is the clarity of the mind, the cultivation of the habit of that, the occasion, and so on.

original: de rnams kho na shin tu dang ches shin tu la sogs pa'i bye brag las @55b snga phyi nyid du ste /
analyzed: de rnams kho na shin tu dang ches shin tu la sogs pa'i bye brag las @55b snga phyi nyid du ste /
translated: From the distinction of those very causes, such as very and extremely, there is prior and posterior ascertainment.

original: dper na skyed par byed pa dang klog tu 'jug par byed pa po nyid du khyad par med kyang pha 'ong ba mthong nas /
analyzed: dper na skyed par byed pa dang klog tu 'jug par byed pa po nyid du khyad par med kyang pha 'ong ba mthong nas /
translated: For example, although there is no difference in being the one who generates and the one who makes read,

analyzed: gzhan pa'i spyod yul can zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: shing la sogs pa rnams las grong drug gam khang bzangs kyi phreng ba bzhin /

translated: Also, a substance such as a pot is not observed as the characterized if it does not apprehend form, etc. Thus he states the non-observation of intrinsic nature.

original: gang du snang ba kun du 'dzin pa der gzugs ba ltar rung ba kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du snang ba kun du 'dzin pa der gzugs ba ltar rung ba kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Wherever there is apprehension of appearance, it is only suitable to be apprehended as form, etc.

analyzed: snang ba med par yang srog chags 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de 'dzin pa'i phyir des ma nges pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that it is not ascertained because some living beings apprehend it even without appearance.

original: de bzhin du khyad par can rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par can rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: yod pa dang yon tan nyid dag gis sngar ma nges par brjod pa de yongs su spang ba'i ched du nye bar bkod pa ste /
translated: Existence and quality were previously stated as not ascertained. In order to completely abandon that, he posits:

original: khyad par can rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: khyad par can rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The particular ones are form and so on.

analyzed: de rnams tha dad pa rnams yod pa dang yon tan zhes pa'i khyad par 'di dang ma 'brel pa kho na rnams /
translated: Those that are different, which are only not related to the distinction of existence and quality,

original: sngar nye bar dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i de las don gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yod pa ma yin pa dang yon tan ma yin pa las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can te /

translated: are the object of the cognition that is associated with the prior perception and has the characteristic of excluding the object that is different from that, which is the characteristic of being not nonexistent and not being not a quality.

original: gang spyi yin pa de yul lo zhes pa ji srid pa'o //
analyzed: gang spyi yin pa de yul lo zhes pa ji srid pa'o //
translated: As long as it is a universal, it is the object.

original: tha mi dad pas thams cad du zhes pa /
analyzed: tha mi dad pas thams cad du zhes pa /
translated: Since they are not different, it is everywhere.

original: yid las byung ba'i shes pa spyi'i rnam pa'i rjes su 'brel pa de ni de rnams tha dad pa yod kyang bsgribs nas /
analyzed: yid las byung ba'i shes pa spyi'i rnam pa'i rjes su 'brel pa de ni de rnams tha dad pa yod kyang bsgribs nas /
translated: The cognition that arises from the mind, which is related to the aspect of the universal, obscures the difference of those,

original: rang gi rnam pa tha mi dad pa yang 'di rnams la zhen te /
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa tha mi dad pa yang 'di rnams la zhen te /
translated: and it conceives their aspect as not different.

original: gcig nyid lta bur kun nas len cing de rnams tha mi dad pas de thams cad la nye bar skye'i gcig kho na la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid lta bur kun nas len cing de rnams tha mi dad pas de thams cad la nye bar skye'i gcig kho na la ni ma yin no //
translated: It grasps them as if they were one, and since they are not different, it arises in relation to all of them, but not in relation to just one.

original: yod pa dang yon tan nyid dag ni mngon sum ma yin no zhes pa 'di las ma nges pa ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa dang yon tan nyid dag ni mngon sum ma yin no zhes pa 'di las ma nges pa ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intended meaning is that it is not indefinite, since it is not the case that existence and the qualities themselves are not directly perceived.

original: de nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: de nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: In order to illustrate that, he says:

original: sngar nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni dngos po tha dad pa'i yul can te /
analyzed: sngar nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni dngos po tha dad pa'i yul can te /
translated: The cognition that previously experienced is the subject of a different object.

original: de'i phyir de sngon du 'gro ba ni yid las byung ba spyi'i shes pa'o zhes khyad par 'di nye bar ma mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de sngon du 'gro ba ni yid las byung ba spyi'i shes pa'o zhes khyad par 'di nye bar ma mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, since this distinction is not illustrated, the cognition of the universal that arises from the mind has that as its antecedent.

original: spyod yul mtshungs nyid 'dod @60a * //
analyzed: spyod yul mtshungs nyid 'dod @60a * //
translated: If you assert that the object is the same,

original: ce na // zhes pa ma nges pa nyid gzhung gzugs pa'i ched du nye bar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: ce na // zhes pa ma nges pa nyid gzhung gzugs pa'i ched du nye bar bkod pa'o //
translated: he presents the text in order to show that it is indefinite.

original: spyod yul mtshungs pa nyid la gtan tshigs smras pa /
analyzed: spyod yul mtshungs pa nyid la gtan tshigs smras pa /
translated: He states the reason for the sameness of the object:

original: de mi 'dzin na de'i blo med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa khyad par byed pa ma bzung bas khyad par can la blo 'jug pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de mi 'dzin na de'i blo med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa khyad par byed pa ma bzung bas khyad par can la blo 'jug pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because if it is not apprehended, there is no cognition of it. The meaning is that the cognition of the qualified does not occur without apprehending the qualifier.

original: de las kyang gzugs la sogs pa khyad par can rnams dbang po thams cad pa nyid kyi phyir de'i khyad par yod pa nyid dang yon tan nyid dag dbang po thams cad pa nyid du grub bo //
analyzed: de las kyang gzugs la sogs pa khyad par can rnams dbang po thams cad pa nyid kyi phyir de'i khyad par yod pa nyid dang yon tan nyid dag dbang po thams cad pa nyid du grub bo //
translated: Moreover, since the specific things such as form, etc., are the objects of all the senses, their specific existence and their specific quality are established as the objects of all the senses.

original: gang khyad par dang khyad par can du gyur pa de rnams dbang po mtshungs pa'i yul yin te /
analyzed: gang khyad par dang khyad par can du gyur pa de rnams dbang po mtshungs pa'i yul yin te /
translated: Those which are the specific and the general are the objects of the same sense,

original: dper na dbyug pa dang dbyug pa can bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na dbyug pa dang dbyug pa can bzhin no //
translated: just as a stick and a stick-holder are.

original: yod pa nyid dang de dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang de dang ldan pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang de dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang de dang ldan pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o //
translated: Existence and its possessor, quality and its possessor, are also like that.

original: rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan no //
translated: The natural reflection.

original: mi 'dod pa la thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa la thal bar 'gyur //
translated: The unwanted consequence.

original: zhes pa thal 'gyur gyi zol gyis ma nges pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa thal 'gyur gyi zol gyis ma nges pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: Thus, he states that the reductio is inconclusive.

original: rdzas dang ldan pa rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdzas dang ldan pa rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The existence of the substance, etc.,

original: rdzas 'di rnams kyi rten du yod pa zhes pa rdzas dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdzas 'di rnams kyi rten du yod pa zhes pa rdzas dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: is the existence of the substance as the substratum of these things.

original: 'dir rdzas dang ldan pas yon tan ni khyad par can te /
analyzed: 'dir rdzas dang ldan pas yon tan ni khyad par can te /
translated: Here, the quality that possesses substance is special.

original: rdzas ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: rdzas ni khyad par ro //
translated: Substance is a particular.

original: de las kyang ji ltar yon tan dbang po lnga pa yin pa de bzhin du rdzas kyang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang ji ltar yon tan dbang po lnga pa yin pa de bzhin du rdzas kyang 'gyur ro //
translated: And just as the quality is the five sense faculties, so too would substance be.

original: de bzhin du rdzas gcig pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: ji skad du bshad pa /üîΩphyi rol gyi don rnams la /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa / phyi rol gyi don rnams la /

original: yid kyi 'jug pas yang dag par rig par bya ba ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'jug pas yang dag par rig par bya ba ste /

original: dbang po'i 'jug pa dang lhan cig pas phyi rol gyi don ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i 'jug pa dang lhan cig pas phyi rol gyi don ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: not by the activity of the sense faculties, which are external.

original: de'i phyir gang rna ba la sogs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa yid kyi 'jug pas gzung bar bya ba de ni des byin gyis brlabs pa zhes brjod de /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang rna ba la sogs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa yid kyi 'jug pas gzung bar bya ba de ni des byin gyis brlabs pa zhes brjod de /
translated: Therefore, that which is to be grasped by the activity of the mental faculty, which is the activity of the ear, etc., is said to be empowered by it.

original: dbang po rnams kyi 'jug pa ni /üîΩrang gi yul nye bar gyur pa na /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi 'jug pa ni / rang gi yul nye bar gyur pa na /
translated: The activity of the sense facultiesüîΩis to be known as the transformation of their objects

original: de'i rnam par yongs su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //üîΩde slar yang @62a * //
analyzed: de'i rnam par yongs su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o // de slar yang @62a * //
translated: when they come into proximity.

original: rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: That is twofold:

original: rkyen dang bcas pa dang rkyen med pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen dang bcas pa dang rkyen med pa'o //
translated: with conditions and without conditions.

original: rkyen ni skyes bu las byung ba'i rtogs par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rkyen ni skyes bu las byung ba'i rtogs par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The conditions are to be described as arising from the person,

original: sems pa can nyid kyi ngo bo yul nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sems pa can nyid kyi ngo bo yul nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: because they are the nature of the experiencer of the object.

original: 'di yang bdag gi ngo bo yin gyi gzhan 'ga' zhig gi ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang bdag gi ngo bo yin gyi gzhan 'ga' zhig gi ma yin te /
translated: This is the nature of the self, not of anything else,

original: sems pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the nature of the insentient.

original: skyes bu las byung ba'i rkyen de dang lhan cig 'dus pa gang yin pa de dang ngo bo gcig pa lta bur ston pa de ni rkyen dang bcas pa ste /üîΩdper na bsregs pa'i gnas skabs na lcags kyi gong bu me dang 'dres pa las de'i rang bzhin ma yin yang me'i rang bzhin nyid lta bur 'byung ba de bzhin du 'jug pa ni nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo ma yin yang sems pa can dang 'dres pa
analyzed: skyes bu las byung ba'i rkyen de dang lhan cig 'dus pa gang yin pa de dang ngo bo gcig pa lta bur ston pa de ni rkyen dang bcas pa ste / dper na bsregs pa'i gnas skabs na lcags kyi gong bu me dang 'dres pa las de'i rang bzhin ma yin yang me'i rang bzhin nyid lta bur 'byung ba de bzhin du 'jug pa ni nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo ma yin yang sems pa can dang 'dres pa
translated: That which is similar to the nature of that which is concomitant with the condition that arises from the person is accompanied by conditions.

original: las sems pa can gyi ngo bo lta bur 'byung ngo //
analyzed: las sems pa can gyi ngo bo lta bur 'byung ngo //
translated: For example, in the state of being burned, a lump of iron is mixed with fire. Although it is not the nature of that, it arises as if it were the nature of fire. In the same way, although engagement is not the nature of experience, it arises as if it were the nature of the experiencer, mixed with the experiencer.

original: gang yang 'jug pa sgron ma'i 'od lta bu yul gsal bar byed pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi sems pa can dang 'dres pa las de'i ngo bo lta bur byung ba ni ma yin pa de rkyen med pa zhes brjod do//
analyzed: gang yang 'jug pa sgron ma'i 'od lta bu yul gsal bar byed pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi sems pa can dang 'dres pa las de'i ngo bo lta bur byung ba ni ma yin pa de rkyen med pa zhes brjod do//
translated: That which is not mixed with the experiencer, and is not arisen as if it were the nature of the experiencer, is called unaccompanied.

original: de la rkyen med pa'i 'jug pa bzlog pa'i ched du 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin pa zhes smras so //
analyzed: de la rkyen med pa'i 'jug pa bzlog pa'i ched du 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin pa zhes smras so //
translated: In order to refute the unaccompanied engagement, it is said to be engaged in apprehending.

original: sgra dang reg bya dang gzugs dang ro dang dri rnams las rim pa ji lta bar zhes pa 'dis rang gi yul la nges par 'jug par brjod pa las yul nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgra dang reg bya dang gzugs dang ro dang dri rnams las rim pa ji lta bar zhes pa 'dis rang gi yul la nges par 'jug par brjod pa las yul nges pa nyid do //
translated: Sound, tactility, form, taste, and smell are the objects of the ear, body, eye, tongue, and nose, respectively.

original: 'o na rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa kho na sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dzin par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: 'o na rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa kho na sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dzin par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the engagement of the ear and so on is the apprehension of sound and so on,

original: de la gang 'dzin pa la 'jug par byed pa 'jug pa gzhan ci zhig yin zhe na /üîΩkha cig smra ba'i dbang po'i yul bar ma chod pas 'jug pa k'a sh'a yis mngon par bcom pa lta bu'am /

original: gyen du gtor ba'i chu lta bu yul rang nyid la mi gnas pa'i 'jug pa brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: gyen du gtor ba'i chu lta bu yul rang nyid la mi gnas pa'i 'jug pa brjod par bya zhing /

analyzed: gnas pa ni yul gyi rnam pa yongs su gyur pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'dzin pa'o zhes pa ste /

original: gang la bar chod pa med pa sna la sogs pa de la yang dbang po'i yul dang 'brel pa las bar ma chad par rnam par 'gyur ba skye bzhin pa yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i 'jug par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang la bar chod pa med pa sna la sogs pa de la yang dbang po'i yul dang 'brel pa las bar ma chad par rnam par 'gyur ba skye bzhin pa yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i 'jug par shes par bya'o //
translated: But even in the case of nose, etc., where there is no obstruction, one should understand that the engagement of the present cognition, which is not complete in the aspect of the object, is in the process of arising, without interruption, from the connection with the object of the sense faculty.

original: des yongs su rdzogs pa ni nang gi 'dzin pa'o zhes so //üîΩgzhan rnams smra ba ni 'jug pa rnams rtog pa med pa nyid du nye bar bstan pa'i don du /
analyzed: des yongs su rdzogs pa ni nang gi 'dzin pa'o zhes so // gzhan rnams smra ba ni 'jug pa rnams rtog pa med pa nyid du nye bar bstan pa'i don du /
translated: The completion of that is the internal grasping.

original: sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin pa zhes 'di tha dad par bshad de /üîΩ'di skad bshad @62b par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin pa zhes 'di tha dad par bshad de / 'di skad bshad @62b par 'gyur te /
translated: Others say that the engagement of sound, etc., is explained separately in order to show that it is non-conceptual.

original: rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa tsam la 'jug bzhin pa ni mngon sum tshad ma ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa tsam la 'jug bzhin pa ni mngon sum tshad ma ste /
translated: The meaning is as follows: The engagement in the mere grasping of its own nature is the direct valid cognition.

original: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: gal te yang rnam par rtog pa la 'di srid pa yod pa ma yin mod /
analyzed: gal te yang rnam par rtog pa la 'di srid pa yod pa ma yin mod /
translated: Even though this is not possible for conceptual cognition,

original: de lta na yang rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par rtog pa can mngon sum du brtags pa de la ltos pas khyad par 'di'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par rtog pa can mngon sum du brtags pa de la ltos pas khyad par 'di'o //
translated: Nevertheless, the Vai≈õe·π£ikas and others imagine that the conceptual cognition is perception, and so this distinction is made.

original: 'jug pa thams cad ni 'dzin pa tsam la 'jug ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa thams cad ni 'dzin pa tsam la 'jug ste /
translated: All engagement is engagement in mere apprehension,

original: rnam par rtog pa can ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: not in conceptual cognition.

original: 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin ba zhes pa de'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin ba zhes pa de'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúWhile engaged in apprehension‚Äù means ‚Äúhaving that as its nature,‚Äù is the meaning.

original: gzhan rnams ni /
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni /
translated: Others

original: rkyen med pa'i 'jug pa kho na tshad ma dang rkyen dang bcas pa ni 'bras bur 'dod do //
analyzed: rkyen med pa'i 'jug pa kho na tshad ma dang rkyen dang bcas pa ni 'bras bur 'dod do //
translated: assert that only engagement without conditions is valid cognition, and that with conditions is the result.

original: 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin pa zhes pa yang 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pa la 'jug bzhin pa zhes pa yang 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhile engaged in apprehension‚Äù should be stated like this:

original: 'dzin pa la ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pa la ste /
translated: ‚Äúwhile engaged in apprehension,

original: 'bras bu bya ba la ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu bya ba la ste /
translated: while engaged in the result,

original: 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan 'jug pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan 'jug pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the activity.‚Äù The meaning is: ‚Äúengagement with the sign of apprehension.‚Äù

analyzed: dbang po thug med ces pa dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúInfinite sense faculties‚Äù means it would follow that the sense faculties would be infinite.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the reason? It is said:

original: de rnams kyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBy those‚Äù and so on.

original: ji skad du bshad pa 'on pas /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa 'on pas /
translated: As it was explained, the deaf

original: dbang po dgu rnams yod pa na //
analyzed: dbang po dgu rnams yod pa na //

original: sgra mi thos te /
analyzed: sgra mi thos te /

analyzed: de'i phyir rna ba kho na sgra'i yul can te /
translated: Therefore, the ear alone is the object of sound.

original: 'dis pags pa la sogs pa rnams rang gi yul la 'jug par rtogs par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: 'dis pags pa la sogs pa rnams rang gi yul la 'jug par rtogs par bya'o zhes so //
translated: In the same way, it should be understood that skin and so on engage their own objects.

analyzed: yon tan gsum rnams ni yon tan gsum nyid de /

analyzed: 'phel ba ni lhag pa'o //

original: 'grib pa ni dman pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'grib pa ni dman pa nyid do //

translated: Moreover, since there are infinite varieties of faculties, such as those born from the six sense objects of form, sound, etc., and those born from the six sense objects of smell, taste, etc., there would be an infinite number of faculties.

original: ji ltar sgra la sogs pa'i rigs kyi dbye ba yon tan 'phel ba dang 'grib pa las 'gyur ba de ltar drug las skyes pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar sgra la sogs pa'i rigs kyi dbye ba yon tan 'phel ba dang 'grib pa las 'gyur ba de ltar drug las skyes pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang ngo //
translated: Just as the varieties of sound, etc., are distinguished by the increase and decrease of their qualities, so also the varieties of those born from the six sense objects, etc., are distinguished by the increase and decrease of their qualities.

original: de'i phyir 'di skad bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di skad bshad par 'gyur ro //

original: sgra dang reg bya la sogs pa bzhin /üîΩblo @63a * //
analyzed: sgra dang reg bya la sogs pa bzhin / blo @63a * //

analyzed: gsal ba la sogs pa'i sgra'i khyad par rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin gyi thal 'gyur ro //

original: de las kyang khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is undermined by what is accepted.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: gal te 'phel ba dang 'grib pa la sogs ba tha dad pa'i drug las skyes pa la sogs pa rnams la yang rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba gcig po yon tan gsum gyi rigs dang ldan par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te 'phel ba dang 'grib pa la sogs ba tha dad pa'i drug las skyes pa la sogs pa rnams la yang rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba gcig po yon tan gsum gyi rigs dang ldan par 'dod na /
translated: If you accept that, then it follows that the six, such as that arisen from the six elements, would be apprehended by the ear sense faculty, because they are a single entity that possesses the nature of the three qualities.üîΩYou have accepted the three cycles!üîΩYou have accepted the three cycles!

original: dbang po gcig kho nar thob ste /
analyzed: dbang po gcig kho nar thob ste /
translated: If you accept that, then it follows that the ear sense faculty would be obtained as a single sense faculty,

original: thams cad du yon tan gsum tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du yon tan gsum tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the three qualities are not different in all of them.

original: gang yon tan gsum tha mi dad pa'i rigs dang ldan pa de rnams rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba rnams te /
analyzed: gang yon tan gsum tha mi dad pa'i rigs dang ldan pa de rnams rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba rnams te /
translated: That which possesses the nature of the three qualities that are not different is apprehended by the ear sense faculty,

original: drug skyes la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: drug skyes la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: like that arisen from the six elements and so on.

original: sgra dang reg bya la sogs pa yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgra dang reg bya la sogs pa yang de lta bu'o //
translated: Sound, tactility, and so on are also like that.

original: de kho na'i thal 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na'i thal 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the reductio.

original: 'o na las kyi dbang las dbang po mngon par 'grub kyi gzung ba'i dbang las ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na las kyi dbang las dbang po mngon par 'grub kyi gzung ba'i dbang las ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that the sense faculties are produced by the power of karma and not by the power of the object?

original: de la ci ltar dbang po mtha' yas pa 'am dbang po gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes pa'i rtsod pa 'di ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ci ltar dbang po mtha' yas pa 'am dbang po gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes pa'i rtsod pa 'di ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How could there be the dispute, ‚ÄúHow could there be an infinite number of faculties or a single faculty?‚Äù

original: kho bo cag gi las kyi dbang las te /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi las kyi dbang las te /
translated: It is due to the power of karma.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes 'dod do //
translated: The ripening of karma is inconceivable.

original: pha rol pos ni skyes bu'i 'dod pa 'grub pa'i ched du gtso bo'i 'jug pa'o zhes sems te /
analyzed: pha rol pos ni skyes bu'i 'dod pa 'grub pa'i ched du gtso bo'i 'jug pa'o zhes sems te /
translated: The opponent thinks that the engagement of prakriti is for the purpose of accomplishing the desires of purusha.

original: de la gal te dbang po gcig kho nas skyes bu'i don phun sum tshogs na dbang po gcig gi bdag nyid kho nas rang bzhin yongs su 'gyur bar rigs te /
analyzed: de la gal te dbang po gcig kho nas skyes bu'i don phun sum tshogs na dbang po gcig gi bdag nyid kho nas rang bzhin yongs su 'gyur bar rigs te /
translated: If the complete purpose of purusha is accomplished by a single faculty, then it would be logical that the transformation of prakriti would be by a single faculty alone.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ni rnam pa gzhan du'o zhes pas rtsod par rigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ni rnam pa gzhan du'o zhes pas rtsod par rigs so //
translated: Otherwise, if it were otherwise, then it would be logical to dispute that.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod yon tan gsum nyid kho na rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bya'o zhes mi smra'i /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod yon tan gsum nyid kho na rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bya'o zhes mi smra'i /
translated: We reply: This is true, but we do not say that the three qualities alone are apprehended by the auditory faculty.

original: 'on kyang de kho na'i yongs su 'gyur ba blo rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan 'dra ba shes pa ni zhes bya ba ni rigs yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang de kho na'i yongs su 'gyur ba blo rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan 'dra ba shes pa ni zhes bya ba ni rigs yin la /

analyzed: de yang sgra'i bye brag thams cad la rjes su 'jug cing reg bya la sogs pa rnams las bzlog pa yang do //

original: de kho na rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: de kho na rna ba'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba ste /
translated: That reality is to be apprehended by the auditory faculty.

original: de'i phyir skyon cung zad kyang med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyon cung zad kyang med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, there is not the slightest fault.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: To that, it is said:

original: yon tan gsum las tha dad pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan gsum las tha dad pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the three qualities, different‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: ci ltar med ces smras te /
analyzed: ci ltar med ces smras te /
translated: How is it said to be non-existent?

original: dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can gyi rigs ni yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can gyi rigs ni yod pa kho na ste /
translated: The type that has the nature of shape certainly exists.

original: yon tan gsum tha mi dad na yang yon tan gsum gyi gnas skabs tsam tha dad pa las sgra la sogs pa'i rigs rnams tha dad do //
analyzed: yon tan gsum tha mi dad na yang yon tan gsum gyi gnas skabs tsam tha dad pa las sgra la sogs pa'i rigs rnams tha dad do //
translated: Even though it is not different from the three qualities, the types of sound, etc. are different from the mere different states of the three qualities.

original: @63b de skad du yang bshad pa /
