translated: or because of the existence of that, this exists, this is the definition of existence.

original: yod ba min pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid du yang dag par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: yod ba min pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid du yang dag par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Nonexistence is not a reason or a definition.

original: de las kyang gal te yang dag par phrad pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis blo skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de las kyang gal te yang dag par phrad pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis blo skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If the cognition arises from the reason of real contact,

original: de yod pas de yod par mtshon par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: de yod pas de yod par mtshon par bya ba yin na /
translated: or if the existence of this is indicated by the existence of that,

original: de ltar gyur na yang dag par phrad pa ni yod pa'o zhes pa 'di rtogs par bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na yang dag par phrad pa ni yod pa'o zhes pa 'di rtogs par bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: then in that case, the existence of real contact would be understood.

original: de ltar 'gyur te rtogs par 'gyur ba bden mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur te rtogs par 'gyur ba bden mod /
translated: If that is so, it is true that it would be understood.

original: de lta na yang gang 'di ni pha rol po rnams kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i rtogs pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can dang rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni yod pa ma yin na yang yang dag par phrad pa na 'gyur ro zhes pa de
analyzed: de lta na yang gang 'di ni pha rol po rnams kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i rtogs pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can dang rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni yod pa ma yin na yang yang dag par phrad pa na 'gyur ro zhes pa de
translated: you say that the object of the cognition of the past and future of others, and the cognition of the yogi, do not exist, but when they contact their objects, they do exist.

original: bsal ba'i don du yod pa smos pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: bsal ba'i don du yod pa smos pa'o zhe na /
translated: In order to refute that, we say that they exist.

original: 'di mi rigs @75a * //
analyzed: 'di mi rigs @75a * //
translated: This is not correct,

original: te / bdun pa'i mtha' can phrad pa'i sgra yod pa'i don la mi 'khrul ba kho nas rtogs pa 'di'i bzlog zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: te / bdun pa'i mtha' can phrad pa'i sgra yod pa'i don la mi 'khrul ba kho nas rtogs pa 'di'i bzlog zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the word ‚Äúcontact,‚Äù which ends in the seventh case, is only nonerroneous with respect to the meaning of existence, and so it is already refuted.

original: gzhan yang kho bo cag gi rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum yod pa'i yul can kho nar sngar nyid bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan yang kho bo cag gi rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum yod pa'i yul can kho nar sngar nyid bshad zin to //
translated: Moreover, we have already explained that the yogic perception of ourselves has only existent objects.

original: gang yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi shes pa brjod pa de yang nye bar btags pa las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can nyid du khas blang bar bya'i /
analyzed: gang yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi shes pa brjod pa de yang nye bar btags pa las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can nyid du khas blang bar bya'i /
translated: And the cognition of the yogi that has as its object the past and future is also said to be merely nominally said to have the past and future as its object.

original: don dam par na de yang da ltar ba'i yul can kho na'o //
analyzed: don dam par na de yang da ltar ba'i yul can kho na'o //
translated: In the ultimate sense, it is only the present subject that is so.

original: ci ltar byas pas she na /
analyzed: ci ltar byas pas she na /
translated: How is it so?

original: gang phyir nga ltar ba'i dngos po ni 'das ba'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi dngos dang brgyud pas phan gdags par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang phyir nga ltar ba'i dngos po ni 'das ba'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi dngos dang brgyud pas phan gdags par bya ba ste /
translated: Because the present thing is the object to be benefited by the present causes and conditions, directly and indirectly.

original: gang gi bar ma chad par gang skye ba de'i dngos su yin la /
analyzed: gang gi bar ma chad par gang skye ba de'i dngos su yin la /
translated: That which arises without interruption is the direct object.

original: gang rnams las bar chod pas yin pa de rnams kyi brgyud pas so //
analyzed: gang rnams las bar chod pas yin pa de rnams kyi brgyud pas so //
translated: That from which it is separated by something else is the indirect object.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rnams kyi yang 'di phan 'dogs par byed pa po ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rnams kyi yang 'di phan 'dogs par byed pa po ste /
translated: The present thing is also the benefactor of future things.

original: dngos po gang rnams de las de ma thag par 'byung ba de rnams kyi ni dngos su yin pa la de las phyis kyi dus su 'byung ba rnams kyi ni brgyud pas so //
analyzed: dngos po gang rnams de las de ma thag par 'byung ba de rnams kyi ni dngos su yin pa la de las phyis kyi dus su 'byung ba rnams kyi ni brgyud pas so //
translated: That which arises immediately from it is the direct object. That which arises later from it is the indirect object.

original: gang yang 'di 'das pa'i phan gdags par bya ba nyid dang ma 'ongs pa'i phan 'dogs pa po nyid bar chod pa dang cig shos kyang yin te 'di'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gang yang 'di 'das pa'i phan gdags par bya ba nyid dang ma 'ongs pa'i phan 'dogs pa po nyid bar chod pa dang cig shos kyang yin te 'di'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The past is that which is to be benefited and the future is that which benefits, but they are also the present and the other, for this is their nature.

original: da ltar ba'i dngos po de yang bsgom pa rab kyi mthar thug pa las skyes pa'i shes pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis yongs su gcod par byed pa las bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su gcod par byed de /
analyzed: da ltar ba'i dngos po de yang bsgom pa rab kyi mthar thug pa las skyes pa'i shes pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis yongs su gcod par byed pa las bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su gcod par byed de /
translated: That present thing is also completely ascertained by yogins through the consciousness arisen from the culmination of supreme meditation.

original: de la cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is completely ascertained in all its aspects, because it is partless.

original: de de ltar yongs su gcod pa na /üîΩting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dngos po de'i phan 'dogs par byed pa dang phan gdags par bya ba'i don gang yin pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa de rnams ngo shes pa mi bslu ba rnams bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su gcod pa na / ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dngos po de'i phan 'dogs par byed pa dang phan gdags par bya ba'i don gang yin pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa de rnams ngo shes pa mi bslu ba rnams bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i
translated: When it is completely ascertained in that way,

original: khyad par gyi stobs las nye bar skye ste /
analyzed: khyad par gyi stobs las nye bar skye ste /
translated: the yogins who have arisen from meditative stabilization ascertain the past and future objects that are to be benefited and the benefit, which are not deceptive, through the power of the special consciousness arisen from meditation.

original: gang rnams kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rnam par gzhag pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang rnams kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rnam par gzhag pa byed pa'o //
translated: It is that by which one posits the past and future.

original: de ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don gyi yul can shes pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes pas rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa las /
analyzed: de ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don gyi yul can shes pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes pas rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa las /
translated: Thus, the cognition that has as its object the past and future is the result of the yogi's cognition. Thus, the result is figuratively designated as the cause.

original: de yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: And it should be said that it has as its object the past and future.

original: de yul med par 'gyur mod de /
analyzed: de yul med par 'gyur mod de /
translated: It would have no object,

original: don dam par 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba dag med @75b ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba dag med @75b ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because ultimately the past and future do not exist.

original: de lta na yang gsal bar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don so sor snang ba de rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang mi bslu ba nyid kyi phyir mngon sum nyid du mi 'gal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang gsal bar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don so sor snang ba de rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang mi bslu ba nyid kyi phyir mngon sum nyid du mi 'gal ba kho na'o //
translated: Even so, it is not contradictory that it is perception, because it clearly appears as the past and future object, and because it is nondeceptive, although it is nonconceptual.

original: ji ltar khyed kyis brtsad pa skyes zin pa'i blo ma 'ongs pa'i yul can chos kyi rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa ma yin na yang mi bslu ba'i phyir tshad ma nyid du 'dod pa de ltar kho bo cag gis kyang ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu las de
analyzed: ji ltar khyed kyis brtsad pa skyes zin pa'i blo ma 'ongs pa'i yul can chos kyi rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa ma yin na yang mi bslu ba'i phyir tshad ma nyid du 'dod pa de ltar kho bo cag gis kyang ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu las de
translated: Just as you assert that a cognition that has arisen is a valid cognition with regard to a past object, even though it does not apprehend the nature of the object, because it is nondeceptive, in the same way, we also assert that a cognition arisen from a cause is a valid cognition with regard to a present object, because it is nondeceptive.

original: mngon sum nyid de /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid de /
translated: It is direct perception.

original: gsal bar 'das pa la sogs pa'i don so sor snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: gsal bar 'das pa la sogs pa'i don so sor snang ba nyid do //
translated: It is the appearance of a clear object, such as a past object.

original: slar yang de rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang mi bslu ba nyid ni rnal 'byor gyi stobs las te /
analyzed: slar yang de rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang mi bslu ba nyid ni rnal 'byor gyi stobs las te /
translated: Its nonconceptuality and nondeceptiveness are due to the power of yoga.

original: las dang lha la sogs pa'i byin rlabs kyi stobs las rmi lam bden pa mthong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: las dang lha la sogs pa'i byin rlabs kyi stobs las rmi lam bden pa mthong ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like seeing a true dream due to the power of the blessing of karma, deities, and so on.

original: de'i phyir dgongs pa med pa'i yod pa zhes pa 'di bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dgongs pa med pa'i yod pa zhes pa 'di bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore it is not at all the case that this is a nonimplicative negation.

original: 'o na yang 'di ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'o na yang 'di ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: However, this is not the definition of direct perception.

original: 'on kyang 'ga' zhig gis rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa'i mngon sum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid brjod pa de dgag pa'i don du chos 'di brjod pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'ga' zhig gis rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa'i mngon sum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid brjod pa de dgag pa'i don du chos 'di brjod pa ste /
translated: However, this is stated in order to refute the definition of the direct perception of the consciousness of a yogi, and so on.

original: rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don gyi chos mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don gyi chos mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúdharma‚Äù is not the definition of direct perception.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba'i mngon sum dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyang shes pa'i dus na yod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba'i mngon sum dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyang shes pa'i dus na yod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: Because at the time of knowing the dharma that is the cause of such direct perception, it does not exist.

original: de'i phyir dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa la rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa la rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not a reason for realizing a meaning that is beyond the senses.

original: de ni yod bzhin pa la nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni yod bzhin pa la nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is observed to exist.

original: de sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because it has a prior existence,

original: rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa la yang chos kyi rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa la yang chos kyi rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not a reason for the dharma in inference and so on.

original: de'i phyir rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid kho na'i don can chos so zhes pas 'di 'dir gtso bor rnam par bsgrub par bya'i /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid kho na'i don can chos so zhes pas 'di 'dir gtso bor rnam par bsgrub par bya'i /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the term ‚Äúdirect perception‚Äù is the definition of direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyi don 'di ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid gtso bor ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi don 'di ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid gtso bor ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúdirect perception‚Äù is not the definition of direct perception.

original: mngon sum grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su brjod pa tsam kho nar 'di bya ba'o zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su brjod pa tsam kho nar 'di bya ba'o zhe na /
translated: This is because direct perception is already established. It is only a restatement.

original: de mi rigs te /
analyzed: de mi rigs te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: tshad ma rnams ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma rnams ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because the valid cognitions are not established.

original: 'di yang sngar kho nar rtogs par byas zin to //
analyzed: 'di yang sngar kho nar rtogs par byas zin to //
translated: This has already been understood earlier.

original: gzhan yang gal te grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, if direct perception is not established by this definition of direct perception because it is already established,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: then what is it?

original: chos mngon sum gyi rgyu mtshan nyid du yin na /
analyzed: chos mngon sum gyi rgyu mtshan nyid du yin na /
translated: If it is the definition of the cause of direct perception,

original: de ltar gyur na mngon sum rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na mngon sum rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: then direct perception is not the cause,

original: yod bzhin pa la nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di tsam kho na brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yod bzhin pa la nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di tsam kho na brjod par bya'o //
translated: because it is observed to exist. This much alone should be stated.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod @76a * //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod @76a * //
translated: This is so.

original: rang gi ngo bo nges par bstan pa yod na /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nges par bstan pa yod na /
translated: If the intrinsic reality of that is taught,

original: 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid can mngon sum mo zhes rang gi ngo bo nges par shes pa'i phyir de rgyu mtshan ma yin pa nyid du 'grub kyi gzhan du na ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid can mngon sum mo zhes rang gi ngo bo nges par shes pa'i phyir de rgyu mtshan ma yin pa nyid du 'grub kyi gzhan du na ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is established that it is not a reason, because the intrinsic reality of that is known by the statement, ‚ÄúThat which has this kind of characteristic is direct perception.‚Äù

original: gal te rang gi ngo bo nges par bstan pa med par de'i rang gi ngo bo shes pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bo nges par bstan pa med par de'i rang gi ngo bo shes pa ma yin na /
translated: But if the intrinsic reality of that is not known without teaching its intrinsic reality,

original: de'i tshe de grub pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe de grub pa ma yin la /
translated: then at that time it is not established.

original: de las kyang de'i mtshan nyid sgrub pa kho na la brten pa'o zhes bas sun 'byin pa las grol ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang de'i mtshan nyid sgrub pa kho na la brten pa'o zhes bas sun 'byin pa las grol ba ma yin no //
translated: And if it is established from that, then it is not liberated from the fault that the definition is established only in dependence on the definiendum.

original: dbang po'i khyad par can gyis brjod kyi zhes pa /
analyzed: dbang po'i khyad par can gyis brjod kyi zhes pa /
translated: The response that it is expressed by one who has a special faculty is this:

original: dbang po'i khyad par byas pa kho na'i yul ni sbyor zla can yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i khyad par byas pa kho na'i yul ni sbyor zla can yin te /
translated: The object that is made by a special faculty is a qualifier.

original: ji ltar mig gi gzugs zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mig gi gzugs zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúform of the eye‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar smra bar rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar smra bar rigs te /
translated: Therefore it is reasonable to say this:

original: gzugs la sogs pa dang phrad pa na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dang phrad pa na zhes pa'o //
translated: When there is contact with form, etc.

original: ci ste yang 'gyur zhes pa bdag dang dbang po dang yid dang don phrad pa las shes pa skye la /
analyzed: ci ste yang 'gyur zhes pa bdag dang dbang po dang yid dang don phrad pa las shes pa skye la /
translated: If, however, it is asked how it arises, consciousness arises from the contact of self, faculties, mind, and object.

original: de yang gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis smra bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis smra bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: And that cannot be expressed by the words form, etc.

original: de'i phyir de rtogs pa'i ched du yod pa smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rtogs pa'i ched du yod pa smos so //
translated: Therefore, in order to understand that, the word ‚Äúexistent‚Äù is used.

original: dbang po rnams kyi zhes pa'i tshig ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi zhes pa'i tshig ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúfaculties‚Äù has the meaning of illustration.
